slides.title: Human-centered Design
slides.content: Warm voice, confirm info on screen, ask clarifying questions for ambiguity.

slides.title: Integration
slides.content: Connect to reservation system, optional facial recognition with opt-in.

slides.title: Innovations
slides.content: Pre-order drinks while guiding, analytics on guest flow, safety first.

slides.title: Next Steps
slides.content: Add Rasa NLU, ROS integration, CV models for obstacle classification.
